description: This action creates an entry in a Airtable base

configSchema.name: baseId
configSchema.description: The ID of the base into which insert the data

configSchema.name: data
configSchema.description: The data to insert into the base (Format: `{key1: value1, key2: value2...}`)

configSchema.name: tableID
configSchema.description: The table of the base into which you want to insert entry
